entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 06:54 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 10.8°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 10.5°C
Wind: S 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
